dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Kazakhstan just announced Qurban Ait dates for next June.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Kazakhstan just announced Qurban Ait dates for next June.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary data from the Sharia and Fatwa Department of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Kazakhstan (SAMK), Qurban Ait will be celebrated on June 6, 7, and 8.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's interesting—so they're saying it'll be on June 6th, 7th, and 8th, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's interesting-so they're saying it'll be on June sixth, seventh, and eighth, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to preliminary data from the Sharia and Fatwa Department of the Spiritual Administration of Muslims of Kazakhstan (SAMK), Qurban Ait will be celebrated on June 6, 7, and 8.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and if it falls like that, Kazakhstanis could get a three-day weekend in June, which is pretty nice.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and if it falls like that, Kazakhstanis could get a three-day weekend in June, which is pretty nice.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Thanks to Qurban Ait, Kazakhstanis may get a three-day weekend in June.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But wait, they mentioned the exact date isn't final yet, um, because it depends on the lunar calendar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But wait, they mentioned the exact date isn't final yet, um, because it depends on the lunar calendar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Note: SAMK emphasized that the exact date of Qurban Ait will be announced closer to the end of May, as it depends on the lunar calendar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, the SAMK said they'll confirm closer to the end of May, so there might be a one-day shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, the S A M K said they'll confirm closer to the end of May, so there might be a one-day shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Note: SAMK emphasized that the exact date of Qurban Ait will be announced closer to the end of May, as it depends on the lunar calendar. A one-day shift is possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And I saw they've sent an official request to the Ministry of Labor about transferring a public holiday to make it a long weekend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I saw they've sent an official request to the Ministry of Labor about transferring a public holiday to make it a long weekend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: An official request has been sent to the Ministry of Labor and Social Protection of Kazakhstan regarding a potential public holiday transfer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That would be great for planning trips or vacations. Tengrinews.kz even put together a calendar to help people prepare.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That would be great for planning trips or vacations. the website even put together a calendar to help people prepare.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tengrinews.kz has prepared a convenient calendar of public holidays and weekends to help you plan your trips and vacations in advance.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's cool that Qurban Ait is all about sacrifice and compassion—like helping others and, uh, community traditions.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's cool that Qurban Ait is all about sacrifice and compassion-like helping others and, uh, community traditions.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Qurban Ait is celebrated 70 days after Ramadan and symbolizes sacrifice, compassion, and helping others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it comes 70 days after Ramadan, so it's really tied to the Islamic calendar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it comes seventy days after Ramadan, so it's really tied to the Islamic calendar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Qurban Ait is celebrated 70 days after Ramadan and symbolizes sacrifice, compassion, and helping others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think most people will get the day off even if it shifts?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think most people will get the day off even if it shifts?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Probably, since the Ministry of Labor usually approves it based on those religious recommendations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Probably, since the Ministry of Labor usually approves it based on those religious recommendations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Ministry of Labor officially approves the holiday date based on religious recommendations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and for people with a five-day workweek, that extra day off is such a nice bonus for summer.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and for people with a five-day workweek, that extra day off is such a nice bonus for summer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Summer will start on a pleasant note for Kazakhstanis: in June 2025, citizens will enjoy an additional day off.
